page.title: 12Milnsbridge Shopping Centre.
page.content: Milnsbridge has a small shopping centre.The roads are hard to cross because of the traffic. There are plenty of food shops and some people do weekly shopping at "Kwik Save" superstore.If you need money there are 3 banks and 2 building societies. For a good choice of clothing you will have to go to town. The sweet shop opens at 08.00 till 17.30 on weekdays and 08.00 till 14.00 on Saturdays. It's mostly children who buy sweets. Among the favourites are Mars Bars and Kit Kats and a variety of boiled sweets.The shop sells greeting cards too. Young people prefer humorous cards. Close to the viaduct is a workshop in a mill. Here old pine furniture is stripped of paint, smoothed and waxed, and then the furniture is sold.
